comment.caption: View of the barn on the Truman farm
comment.note: Good view of the barn on the Truman farm, with an old hay wagon and horses in front of it. Caption says "The Barn that Grandpa Built." One of a series of photos from Mary Jane Truman's Christmas Album, 1906. From: Copied from photos lent to the Truman Library by Martha Ann Swoyer, daughter of Vivian Truman.
